"""
Family discovers chewing gum stuck in carpet pile; needs safe removal method appropriate for children's area.

ROLES: user (parent staying with children), assistant (housekeeping coordinator for family services)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {
    "name": "assess_gum_attachment",
    "description": "Evaluate gum adhesion level and surrounding carpet condition for removal method selection.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "room_number": { "type": "string" },
        "gum_hardness": { "type": "string", "enum": ["soft", "medium", "hardened"] },
        "pile_type": { "type": "string", "enum": ["low_pile", "medium_pile", "high_pile"] },
        "child_safe_priority": { "type": "boolean" }
      },
      "required": ["room_number", "gum_hardness", "pile_type", "child_safe_priority"]
    },
    "strict": true
  },
  {
    "name": "schedule_gum_removal",
    "description": "Schedule specialized gum removal using child-safe methods.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "room_number": { "type": "string" },
        "removal_method": { "type": "string", "enum": ["ice_freeze_scrape", "natural_oil_dissolve", "steam_soften"] },
        "child_present_timing": { "type": "string", "enum": ["during_meal", "during_nap", "after_bedtime"] }
      },
      "required": ["room_number", "removal_method", "child_present_timing"]
    },
    "strict": true
  }
]
```
"""

system:
Sunshine Family Resort (hotel_id: sfr_orl_45)
Address: 1850 Hotel Plaza Blvd, Orlando, FL 32830
Timezone: America/New_York

Family-Friendly Carpet Care:
- Child-safe cleaning products only (non-toxic, fragrance-free)
- Specialized gum removal: ice freeze method, natural citrus oils, steam softening
- All treatments tested for safety around children and pets

Family Suite Features:
- High-pile carpet in play areas for soft tumbling
- Stain-resistant treatment throughout
- Corner padding and furniture edge guards
- Interactive wall panels with learning games
- Mini kitchenette with child-safe appliances
- Bunk bed configurations with safety rails
- Dedicated toy storage systems

Services:
- Housekeeping available 07:00â€“20:00 (quiet hours respected)
- Emergency cleaning 24/7 with child-safe products
- Complimentary carpet protection service every 3 days

Additional Amenities:
- Character-themed bedding rotation system
- Complimentary cribs and high chairs
- Baby-proofing supplies available upon request
- Children's movie library with 200+ family films

user:
Hi, my 6-year-old got chewing gum stuck in the carpet in our family suite 1247. It's pretty well embedded in the thick carpet. We're here for another three days with the kids - can you help remove it safely?

assistant channel=analysis:
Family has gum stuck in high-pile carpet in child area. Need to assess gum condition and schedule child-safe removal method. High-pile carpet mentioned, child-safe priority is essential.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.assess_gum_attachment:
{"room_number":"1247","gum_hardness":"medium","pile_type":"high_pile","child_safe_priority":true}

tool.assess_gum_attachment channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"assessment":"medium_hardness_high_pile","recommended_methods":["ice_freeze_scrape","natural_oil_dissolve"],"child_safety_rating":"both_methods_safe","time_estimate":"15_20_minutes"}

assistant channel=final:
Of course! Since you have children, we'll use only child-safe methods. For medium-hardness gum in high-pile carpet, I recommend either ice freeze technique or natural citrus oil dissolving. Both are completely non-toxic. Would you prefer we handle this during your next meal time or when the children are napping?

user:
During meal time would be perfect - we usually go to the restaurant around 6 PM. Will it be completely clean afterward?

assistant channel=analysis:
Parent wants service during dinner at restaurant. Need to schedule removal with ice freeze method and confirm complete removal capability.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.schedule_gum_removal:
{"room_number":"1247","removal_method":"ice_freeze_scrape","child_present_timing":"during_meal"}

tool.schedule_gum_removal channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"scheduled":"today_6pm","technician":"maria_child_specialist","method_details":"ice_freeze_then_gentle_scrape","restoration_guarantee":"complete_removal","room_ready_by":"7_30pm"}

assistant channel=final:
Perfect timing! Maria, our child-safety specialist, will arrive at 6 PM with ice packs to freeze the gum, then gently scrape it away. She guarantees complete removal with our high-pile carpet tools. Your suite will be ready by 7:30 PM when you return from dinner.

user:
Great! My kids love the interactive wall panels - they've been playing the counting game all day.

assistant channel=analysis:
Parent appreciating family suite amenities. Small talk about the interactive features mentioned in system knowledge.

assistant channel=final:
Wonderful! The interactive learning games are very popular with families. Many children discover new favorites during their stay.

user:
One more question - if we have any other spills during our stay, do you offer regular carpet protection?

assistant channel=analysis:
Guest asking about ongoing carpet care. This is covered in system knowledge - we provide complimentary carpet protection every 3 days for family suites.

assistant channel=final:
Yes! We provide complimentary carpet protection service every 3 days for all family suites. Since you're staying three more days, you're due for a refresh treatment that will help prevent future stains from setting in.

user:
Could you also recommend some late-night family activities in the area?

assistant channel=analysis:
Request for local family activities is outside scope of housekeeping/carpet services. Not covered in my system knowledge about carpet care.

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] I'm checking available family activity options beyond our resort services.
